original_text: You may work for six days each week, but the seventh day is a day of rest. It is a holy day that is special to me, the Lord. If anyone does any work on a Sabbath day, you must punish him with death.
korean_text: 엿새 동안은 일할 것이나 일곱째 날은 큰 안식일이니 여호와께 거룩한 것이라 안식일에 일하는 자는 누구든지 반드시 죽일지니라

sentences.original_text: You may work for six days each week
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 매주 6일 동안 일할 수 있으나

sentences.original_text: but the seventh day is a day of rest
If anyone does any work on a Sabbath day
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 누가 안식일에 어떤 일이라도 하면

sentences.original_text: you must punish him with death
